On Mon, 5 Aug 2002, dph_of_rules wrote:

> Cool.
>
> You guys will be adding documentation to make it easier to find parts
> of the code you are looking for, right?  Like identifying which module
> sets the damage by weapons?

I could write up what classes do what, but beyond that, there's really not
much to explain. The code is well written and understandable as long as
the reader has a basic idea of what that section is supposed to do.

So yeah, we'll probably have something that says "the video class as
defined in video.h does video". That should be enough for someone to be
able to navigate the code.

- Zardus
